languages.text: "Сегодня вы совершили подвиг во имя Империума. И, как и о большинстве подвигов, совершаемых людьми моей профессии, о нем никому нельзя знать. Поздравляю и сочувствую". {n}Ксавьер устало вздыхает и дарит вам прямой и открытый взгляд, а затем достает из поясной сумки... фляжку.{/n} "Вольный Торговец разделит с Лорд-инквизитором глоток-другой амасека в честь победы?"

"Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, as with most feats performed by people in my line of work, not a soul must learn of it. You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"
languages.original_text: "Сегодня вы совершили подвиг во имя Империума. И, как и о большинстве подвигов, совершаемых людьми моей профессии, о нем никому нельзя знать. Поздравляю и сочувствую". {n}Ксавьер устало вздыхает и дарит вам прямой и открытый взгляд, а затем достает из поясной сумки... фляжку.{/n} "Вольный Торговец разделит с Лорд-инквизитором глоток-другой амасека в честь победы?"

traits.locale_text: "Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, just as many other feats performed by the people of my profession, nobody must know about it. I am sorry and congratulations." {n}Xavier sighs heavily and gives you a honest and straight look, and then reaches for his waist pouch and gets out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of the amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to honour their victory?"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Aujourd'hui, vous avez accompli un exploit au nom de l'Imperium, et comme tant d'autres exploits accomplis par les gens de ma profession, personne ne devra jamais en entendre parler. Je vous présente mes félicitations, ainsi que mes excuses. » {n}Calcazar pousse à nouveau un soupir las, puis vous lance un regard franc et honnête. Il plonge ensuite la main dans le sac à sa ceinture et en sort... une flasque.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} accepterait-{mf|il|elle} de partager quelques gorgées d'amasec avec le seigneur inquisiteur pour célébrer leur victoire ? »
languages.original_text: "Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, as with most feats performed by people in my line of work, not a soul must learn of it. You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"

traits.locale_text: « Aujourd'hui, vous avez accompli un exploit au nom de l'Imperium, et comme tant d'autres exploits accomplis par les gens de ma profession, personne ne devra jamais en entendre parler. Je vous présente mes félicitations, ainsi que mes excuses. » {n}Calcazar pousse à nouveau un soupir las, puis vous lance un regard franc et honnête. Il plonge ensuite la main dans le sac à sa ceinture et en sort... une flasque.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} accepterait-{mf|il|elle} de partager quelques gorgées d'amasec avec le seigneur inquisiteur pour célébrer leur victoire ? »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Hoy ha realizado una hazaña en nombre del Imperium. Y, como muchas otras de las hazañas que se realizan en mi línea de trabajo, nadie puede saber de ella. Mis disculpas y mi enhorabuena». {n}Calcazar suspira con pesadez y te dedica una mirada sincera. Se lleva la mano a la riñonera y saca... una petaca.{/n} «¿Querrá compartir {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente un par de tragos de amasec con el Lord Inquisidor para celebrar su victoria?».
languages.original_text: "Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, as with most feats performed by people in my line of work, not a soul must learn of it. You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"

traits.locale_text: «Hoy ha realizado una hazaña en nombre del Imperium. Y, como muchas otras de las hazañas que se realizan en mi línea de trabajo, nadie puede saber de ella. Mis disculpas y mi enhorabuena». {n}Xavier suspira con pesadez y te dedica una mirada sincera. Se lleva la mano a la riñonera y saca... una petaca.{/n} «¿Querrá compartir {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente un par de tragos de amasec con el Lord Inquisidor para celebrar su victoria?».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “今天，你为帝国完成了一项壮举。不过，就像我们这些人做过的绝大部分壮举一样，这次的壮举也不能让任何人知道。我对此很遗憾，但也要恭喜你。”{n}希维尔再次重重地叹了口气，直率而坦诚地看了你一眼。随后，他伸手去摸他的腰包，拿出了一个……小瓶子。{/n}“不知行商浪人愿不愿意和大审判官一起喝上两口艾玛赛克酒，庆祝这场胜利呢？”
languages.original_text: "Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, as with most feats performed by people in my line of work, not a soul must learn of it. You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"

traits.locale_text: “今天，你为帝国完成了一项壮举。不过，就像我们这些人做过的许多壮举一样，这次的壮举也不能让任何人知道。我很遗憾，但也要恭喜你。”{n}希维尔重重地叹了口气，直率而坦诚地看了你一眼。随后，他伸手去摸他的腰包，拿出了一个……小瓶子。{/n}“不知行商浪人愿不愿意和审判长一起喝上两口艾玛赛克酒，庆祝这场胜利呢？”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ihr habt heute im Namen des Imperiums eine große Tat vollbracht. Und wie es mit den meisten Taten von Leuten meines Metiers ist, darf keine Seele davon erfahren. In diesem Sinne: Herzlichen Glückwunsch und mein Beileid." {n}Calcazar seufzt erneut und sieht dir mit aufrichtigem Blick in die Augen. Dann greift er in seine Gürteltasche und zieht ... eine Flasche heraus.{/n} "Trinkt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit dem Großinquisitor ein Schlückchen Amasec auf den Sieg?"
languages.original_text: "Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, as with most feats performed by people in my line of work, not a soul must learn of it. You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"

traits.locale_text: "Heute habt Ihr im Namen des Imperiums eine Heldentat begangen. Und wie so oft bei den Heldentaten meines Berufsstands darf niemand je davon erfahren. Es tut mir leid und herzlichen Glückwunsch." {n}Xavier seufzt tief und blickt dich ehrlich und direkt an. Dann greift er in seine Gürteltasche und holt daraus ... eine Flasche hervor.{/n} "Trinkt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu Ehren ihres Sieges einen Schluck Amasec mit dem Großinquisitor?"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「今日、お前は帝国の名において偉業を成し遂げた。そして、私と同じ職位にあたる人々が行った他の多くの偉業と同様に、誰にも知られてはならない。心からの同情と称賛を送ろう」{n}カルカサルは大きくため息をつくと、まっすぐな眼差しをあなたに向ける。そしてベルトバッグに手を伸ばし、フラスコを取り出した。{/n}「自由開拓者の勝利の栄光をたたえ、ロード・インクィジターとアマセックを一杯酌み交わさないか？」
languages.original_text: "Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, as with most feats performed by people in my line of work, not a soul must learn of it. You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"

traits.locale_text: 「今日、お前は帝国の名において偉業を成し遂げた。そして、私と同じ職位にあたる人々が行った他の多くの偉業と同様に、誰にも知られてはならない。心からの同情と称賛を送ろう」{n}カルカサルは大きくため息をつくと、まっすぐな眼差しをあなたに向ける。そしてベルトバッグに手を伸ばし、フラスコを取り出した。{/n}「自由開拓者の勝利の栄光をたたえ、ロード・インクィジターとアマセックを一杯酌み交わさないか？」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Bugün İmparatorluk adına büyük işler başardın. Benim meslektaşlarım arasında gerçekleştirilen başarıların çoğunda olduğu gibi bunu kimsenin bilmemesi gerekiyor. Seni tebrik ediyorum ve acını paylaşıyorum." {n}Calcazar, bir kez daha bitkin bir şekilde iç çekip sana doğru bakıyor. Sonra kemerine uzanıp bir şişe çıkarıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, başarısını kutlamak için Lord Engizisyoncu'yla birer yudum amasek paylaşmak ister mi?"
languages.original_text: "Today, you have performed a feat in the name of the Imperium. And, as with most feats performed by people in my line of work, not a soul must learn of it. You have my congratulations and commiserations." {n}Calcazar lets out another weary sigh and gives you a straight and open look. He then reaches for his belt bag and pulls out... a flask.{/n} "Will the Rogue Trader share a sip or two of amasec with the Lord Inquisitor to mark the victory?"
